===Idiom===

# to [[struggle]] through difficult times; to work hard and push through despite hardship
#: {{zh-x|年輕人 應{yīng}該 保持 艱苦奮鬥 的 作風。|''Young people should '''work hard in the face of hardship'''.''}}
#: {{zh-x|不管 我們 的 生活 貧困 還是 富裕，我們 都 得{děi} 艱苦奮鬥。|''Rich or poor, we all must '''work hard in these hard times'''.''}}
